content: pumpkins are such a fun simple home decor item to crochet and you can get away with making different styles and throwing them all together… and they ll still look great so why not try adding a fuzzy pumpkin or a dozen to your home collection or your autumn fair booth stuffed and assembled these pumpkins measure 3 5″ x 1 75″ s 4″ x 2 25″ m and 4 5″ x 2 75″ l
